item.title: SLUB & Buddy System in Linux Kernel
item.author: Author
item.description: CTF games have flourished in recent years. However, more GLIBC heap allocator exploit techiniques are becoming boring and meaningless, especially for games in China. Challenges are well-designed, deliberately constructed, leading to specific ways to solve them, which is actually further and further away from real world exploits. I started to aim more at Linux kernel memory allocator these days and gathered some imformation about Buddy System & SLUB hitherto.

item.title: Linux Kernel Mitigation & Bypass
item.author: Author
item.description: Like user mode, there are also couples of ways of mitigation against exploits in Linux kernel. Here is a list of mitigation in kernel mode and methods to bypass some of them.
